code: import React,{useRef}from'react';import'./contact.css';import emailJS from'emailjs-com';import TextField from'@mui/material/TextField';import Button from'@mui/material/Button';import Stack from'@mui/material/Stack';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Contact=function Contact(){var formref=useRef(null);var sendEmail=function sendEmail(e){e.preventDefault();emailJS.sendForm(process.env.REACT_APP_SERVICE_ID,process.env.REACT_APP_TEMPLATE_ID,formref.current,process.env.REACT_APP_PUBLIC_ID).then(function(result){console.log(result.text);alert("Message Sent");},function(error){console.log(error.text);alert("There was some issue, Please check your email id");});e.target.reset();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"c-left",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Get in touch"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Contact "}),"me"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"c-right",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{ref:formref,onSubmit:sendEmail,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{spacing:2,direction:"column",className:"formInputs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{id:"outlined-basic",label:"Name",variant:"outlined",name:"name",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{id:"outlined-basic",label:"Email",variant:"outlined",name:"email",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{id:"outlined-multiline-static",label:"Your Message",multiline:true,rows:4,placeholder:"Write your Message here...",name:"message",required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"success",className:"formBtn",type:"submit",children:"Send"})]})})]});};export default Contact;
